segments.text: I see the boy on the stool, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks determined to get those cookies, no matter what.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so unstable, it's surprising it hasn't tipped over yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is standing nearby, waiting for a cookie, completely oblivious to the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit angry that they are sneaking cookies like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's focus is solely on the cookie jar, nothing else seems to matter to him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if their mother will notice what they're doing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene reminds me of my own childhood, always trying to get something sweet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the boy is going to regret his actions if he falls off that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they hurry up before someone gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR
